description.value:
Heavy weapons mounted on these platforms always count as braced even if moved. Controlled by a control box, Can move 6 metres as a half action, requiring little effort from the user. Can't operate the weapon on the platform via control box unless it is an eldar one.

Requirements

Xenotech. Counts as separate entity, with 15 AP. Any damage disables and immobilises it. No difference between Craftsmanship besides wear and tear.

Effect: Unique

Notes: -
